EmailTemplate.subject: Keep Your Aircraft Where it Belongs – In the Sky!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
While it is true that today's equipment is more reliable than ever, it is also more complex. When things go wrong, repair costs and downtime can have a more significant impact on your bottom line than ever before.
Corporate Jet Support is pleased to offer customers the unparalleled protection afforded by MSP Mechanical Components (formally known as MPP). Designed for both general and business aviation, this extended warranty program offers full coverage for a wide range of mechanical components, including the cockpit, environmental systems, cabin control systems, and other critical aircraft components.
Protect your investment and control your costs - as the unexpected can happen! For more information on this outstanding program or to request a quote, contact Corporate Jet Support today!
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/CorporateJetSupport_MSP.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_cjs_msp&utm_term=email]]>
